item.title: A quest for adventure! Triathletes take on Wales
item.author: Victoria Thompson,
item.description: On the 2nd September 2017, 15 super keen triathletes took to the hills of the picturesque Brecon Beacons to compete in the second to last event in the Questars Adventure Race series! These adrenaline-filled adventure races involve 90 minutes of trail running, 2.5 hours of mountain biking and one â€¦
